# Employment

```{r EMPLOYMENT}

work %>%
  detailed_entries(
    with = title,
    what = unit,
    why = detail,
    when = glue::glue("{startMonth} {startYear} --> {endMonth} {endYear}",.na = ""),
    where = where
  )

```
